content:
Hi! Embedded WG is currently the maintainer of cross, but we're lacking maintainer time to give it the attention it deserves. See rust-embedded/cross#574 Do you have any suggestions or ideas on what we could do?

Reason for asking here is cross being used in some rust-lang/ crates CI, for example hashbrown, futures-rs and regex

We've discussed some alternatives on what we could do, but we want more input.
